title: Do you know the date the divorce or dissolution took place?
question: Do you know the date the divorce or dissolution took place?
paragraph1: You can find the date on the decree absolute or final order.
paragraph2: If you do not have this, you can get an official copy of the decree absolute or final order (opens in a new tab).
optionNo: No, I do not know the date
optionNoHint: A caseworker will need to ask you for more information which may delay your application

divorceDateKnown.required: Select ‘yes’ if you know the date of the divorce or dissolution

divorceDate-year.required: Date of divorce or dissolution must include a year

divorceDate-month.required: Date of divorce or dissolution must include a month

divorceDate-day.required: Date of divorce or dissolution must include a day

divorceDate-day-month.required: Date of divorce or dissolution must include a day and month

divorceDate-month-year.required: Date of divorce or dissolution must include a month and year

divorceDate-day-year.required: Date of divorce or dissolution must include a day and year

divorceDate-day-month-year.required: Enter the date the divorce or dissolution took place

divorceDate.future: The date of divorce or dissolution must be before {deceasedName}â€™s date of death
divorceDate.invalid: Date of divorce or dissolution must be a real date
